subject: Football
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Running back Najeh Davenport was released by the Pittsburgh Steelers after the team could not work out a trade for him. Also released were safety Mike Lorello, long snapper Jared Retkofsky and offensive lineman Doug Legursky.
snippet: Running back Najeh Davenport was released by the Pittsburgh Steelers after the team could not work out a trade for him. Also released were safety Mike Lorello, long snapper Jared Retkofsky and offensive lineman Doug Legursky.
